verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy fire burn away,
My desire of anything,
That is not of you and is of me,
I want more of you and less of me,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Empty me, Empty Me,
And fill, won't you fill me,
With you, with you,
Oh Empty me now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Won't you empty me, Oh Won't you emtpy me now,
Oh Won't you empty me, Oh Won't you emtpy me now,
I want more, I want more, I want more
Of you Jesus.
I want more, I want more. Ohhhh..

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thank you Jesus, Thank you Jesus,
Thank You Jesus, Holy Fire, Holy Fire.
